name: Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot and environment IDs are invalid format

steps.name: Given User sends POST request to initiate a scan with chatbot "invalid" and environment "invalid"
When the user receives the scan initiation response
Then the status code returned should be 400 for bad request error
And the response should contain an error message "Bad Request"
And the message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: Initiate Scan using Genr3d API: Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot and environment IDs are invalid format
